org.sakaiproject.api.app.messageforums

Interface MembershipManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface MembershipManager

      List convertMemberMapToList(Map memberMap)
      returns a list for UI
      Map getAllCourseMembers(boolean filterFerpa, boolean includeRoles, boolean includeAllParticipantsMember, List<String> hiddenGroups)
      Get members for course all/user/role/group
      Return hash map for direct access to members via id (used in UI when for selected list items)
      To ignore hidden groups, pass in a null value
      List getAllCourseUsers()
      get all users for course w/o filtering of FERPA enabled members
      Map getFilteredCourseMembers(boolean filterFerpa, List<String> hiddenGroups)
      Get filtered members for course all/user/role/group
      Return hash map for direct access to members via id (used in UI when for selected list items)
      Filter roles/groups which do not have members.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilteredCourseMembers

        Map getFilteredCourseMembers(boolean filterFerpa,
                           List<String> hiddenGroups)
        Get filtered members for course all/user/role/group
        Return hash map for direct access to members via id (used in UI when for selected list items)
        Filter roles/groups which do not have members. Also filters out users that the current user is not permitted to view (ie they have privacy status hidden and the current user does not have privileges to view hidden users) To ignore hidden groups, pass in a null value
        Parameters:
        filterFerpa -
        hiddenGroups -
        Returns:
        map of members

      • getAllCourseMembers

        Map getAllCourseMembers(boolean filterFerpa,
                      boolean includeRoles,
                      boolean includeAllParticipantsMember,
                      List<String> hiddenGroups)
        Get members for course all/user/role/group
        Return hash map for direct access to members via id (used in UI when for selected list items)
        To ignore hidden groups, pass in a null value
        Parameters:
        filterFerpa -
        includeRoles -
        includeAllParticipantsMember -
        hiddenGroups -
        Returns:
        map of members
